channel.title: RuneScape only 4.1M ACTIVE players?
channel.description:
I think they said they had like 70m or something before, but I was reading some law stuff about moparisthebest and jagex, and this is what I found:
There are currently some 4.1 million active registered players of the game in over 15 countries.
Above ^^ is what jagex said. If you don't believe me or want some more proof, [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/lawstuff]click here[/url] Jagex is a bunch of whores.

item.title: RuneScape only 4.1M ACTIVE players?

item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

They had 1 million accounts created in the first year alone
I remember that announcement. Which showed they were one of the biggest onling
rpg games in the world

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape only 4.1M ACTIVE players?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Bryanc:

Actually fairly recently, Jagex has claimed to have 175million registered accounts. With 10 millions actives.

last i checked they said 5million on jagex.com a few weeks ago

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:10, topic:291039”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=384766.msg2886189#msg2886189 date=1248627936]
i lol’d at the amount of retardation in this thread

they never said 70 million active, they said they had around 135 million created accounts and around 5-8 million active accounts as of July 2008.
[/quote]
and i bet 60% of those 135million accounts were bots…[/quote]

more like 20%, etc, and who cares?

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape only 4.1M ACTIVE players?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:8, topic:291039"][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=384766.msg2886217#msg2886217 date=1248629788]

“146,544 players online!”

woot we got 4.1m active players!

That doesn’t mean they barely have any active players. Think of the amount of active players(4.1m). Now think of how many have jobs, are in different time zones, or just have better things to do. 146k people playing at once is actually pretty decent.
[/quote]

Lately theres been an upwards to 185,000 people online at one time (mid day, weekends, etc)[/quote]

I wonder if the latest pking updates have brought back any of the old players who actually DID quit because of the trade limit, etc. Jagex has gotten pretty close to the old wilderness if you think about it. A few weeks ago I would check the players online and only see around 90k.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape only 4.1M ACTIVE players?

“146,544 players online!”

woot we got 4.1m active players!

[/quote]

That doesn’t mean they barely have any active players. Think of the amount of active players(4.1m). Now think of how many have jobs, are in different time zones, or just have better things to do. 146k people playing at once is actually pretty decent.[/quote]

Lately theres been an upwards to 185,000 people online at one time (mid day, weekends, etc)
